content.rendered:
The Counseling Department at Saratoga Springs High School will sponsor a program on the college admissions process starting at 6:00 p.m. at the High School on Thursday, January 18 in the Auditorium

Parents and students will hear valuable information from representatives from Siena College and R.P.I. regarding topics such as getting started in the college admissions process and the importance of the college essay, resume and interview. All grade levels are welcome to attend.
